title: 30 minutes weekly
info:
30 minutes to all networks  Afghanistan for 7 days at the price of 40 Afghanis. 
Press the green button to activate and the red button to deactivate. 
Send A OW to activate and D OW to 740

title: 500 weekly minutes
info:
500 minutes for 7 days to  The price is 89 Afghanis. 
Press the green button to activate and the red button to deactivate. 
Send A 89 to activate and D 89 to 740
